Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <Query Id="0"> <!-- Wi-Fi Connection Status --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-WLAN-AutoConfig/Operational"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-WLAN-AutoConfig'] and Level=4 and (EventID=8000 or EventID=8001 or EventID=8003 or EventID=8011 or EventID=11000 or EventID=11001)]] </Select>
<!-- Wi-Fi Connection Failure --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-WLAN-AutoConfig/Operational"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-WLAN-AutoConfig'] and Level=2 and (EventID=8002 or EventID=11002)]] </Select>
<!-- Wi-Fi Security Status --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-WLAN-AutoConfig/Operational"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-WLAN-AutoConfig'] and (Level=2 or Level=4) and (EventID=11004 or EventID=11005 or EventID=11006 or EventID=11010)]] </Select>
<!-- Wi-Fi Authentication Status --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-WLAN-AutoConfig/Operational"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-WLAN-AutoConfig'] and (Level=2 or Level=4) and (EventID=12011 or EventID=12012 or EventID=12013)]] </Select> </Query>
<Query Id="1"> <!-- Network Connection Status --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-NetworkProfile/Operational"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-NetworkProfile'] and Level=4 and (EventID=10000 or EventID=10001)]] </Select> </Query> </QueryList>
